items.name: Kokoro Connect Wiki
items.title: Kokoro Connect Wiki
items.headline: Kokoro Connect Wikia
items.desc: Welcome to Kokoro Connect Wikia! Kokoro Connect Wikia is the one and only comprehensive database about the Novel series written by Sadanatsu Anda and Animated by Starchild Records, Silver Link, Sentai Filmworks and Enterbrain! All fans and anyone interested in learning more are welcome to help contribute to the wikia!
